remarks: Subspace join for ` DVecA ` partial vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
djaval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djaval.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
djaval.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
djaval.n $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocA ` K ) ` W ) $.
djaval.j $e |- J = ( ( vA ` K ) ` W ) $.
djavalN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X C_ T /\ Y C_ T ) ) -> ( X J Y ) = ( ._|_ ` ( ( ._|_ ` X ) i^i ( ._|_ ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
